mapper.select: select id,name,type,measureId,b.isDel,sale,specification,warning,b.createBy,createTime,b.updateBy,updateTime, c.userName as createByName,u.userName as updateByName from base_medicine b LEFT JOIN sys_user c on b.createBy=c.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user u on b.updateBy=u.userId where b.isDel=0 and c.isDel=0 and u.isDel=0
